200.description: Owner, pet and her friends data

spayed.description: Pet spayed. If 0 - not spayed, if 1 - spayed

friends.description: Pet friends only those who are friends with an authenticated user.

spayed.description: Pet spayed. If 0 - not spayed, if 1 - spayed

to_send_message.description: Can send a message to the user

200.description: Success message, pet owner and pet info.

owner[first_name].description: Owner first name. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 15, RegExp - ^([[:alpha:]-]+ ?)+$

owner[last_name].description: Owner last name.  Rules: required, min - 1, max - 15, RegExp - ^([[:alpha:]-]+ ?)+$

owner[gender].description: Owner gender. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 20, RegExp - ^(male|female|[[:alpha:]]+)$

owner[birthday].description: Owner date of birthday. Rules: required, format - 'Y-m-d', before - 'now - 1 day'

owner[occupation].description: Owner occupation. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 128

owner[hobbies].description: Owner hobbies. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 128

owner[favorite_park].description: Owner favorite dog park. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 128

owner[pets_owned].description: Owner pets owned. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 128

owner[profile_picture].description: Owner profile picture. Rules: optional, correct base64 string

pet[friendliness].description: Pet friendliness. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 5

pet[activity_level].description: Pet activity level. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 5

pet[noise_level].description: Pet noise level. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 5

pet[odebience_level].description: Pet odebience level. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 5

pet[fetchability].description: Pet fetchability. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 5

pet[swimability].description: Pet swimability. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 5

pet[name].description: Pet name. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 12, RegExp - ^([[:alpha:]-]+ ?)+$

pet[gender].description: Pet gender. Rules: required, in - [male, female]

pet[size].description: Pet size. Rules: required, in - [small, medium, large, giant]

pet[age].description: Pet age. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 99

pet[birthday].description: Pet date of birthday. Rules: required, format - 'Y-m-d', before - 'now - 1 day'

pet[city].description: Pet hometown. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 15, RegExp - ^([[:alpha:]-]+ ?)+$

pet[state].description: Pet state. Rules: required, min - 2, max - 3, RegExp - ^[A-Z]{2,3}$

pet[like].description: Pet likes. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 128

pet[dislike].description: Pet dislikes. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 128

pet[favorite_toys].description: Pet favorite toys. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 128

pet[fears].description: Pet fears. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 128

pet[favorite_places].description: Pet favorite places. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 128

pet[profile_picture].description: Pet profile picture. Rules: optional, correct base64 string

pet[pictures][create][0].description: Upload pet pictures. Rules: optional, correct base64 string

pet[pictures][delete][0].description: Delete pet picture. Rules: optional, picture id, exists in pet pictures

200.description: Success message, pet owner and pet info.

post.description: Report for user. Create ticket and create two chats

get.description: Sign-up stepper information about owner and her pet.

200.description: Current step of user, pet owner and pet info.

401.description: Unauthenticated error or registration error if user done registration.

put.summary: Update owner and pet info for sign-up steps
put.description: Update information for owner and pet for any steps.

step.description: Required for all steps. If will be send '0' - end registration. Steps count - 12.

owner[first_name].description: Step 1. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 15, RegExp - ^([[:alpha:]-]+ ?)+$

owner[last_name].description: Step 1. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 15, RegExp - ^([[:alpha:]-]+ ?)+$

pet[name].description: Step 1. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 12, RegExp - ^([[:alpha:]-]+ ?)+$

pet[city].description: Step 1. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 15, RegExp - ^([[:alpha:]-]+ ?)+$

pet[state].description: Step 1. Rules: required, min - 2, max - 3, RegExp - ^[A-Z]{2,3}$

pet[size].description: Step 2. Rules: required, in - [small, medium, large, giant]

pet[profile_picture].description: Step 4. base64 string. Rules: required if pet not has profile picture, correct base64 string, types - 'jpg', 'png'

pet[pictures][create][0].description: Step 5. base64 string. Rules: optional, correct base64 string, types - 'jpg', 'png'

pet[pictures][delete][0].description: Step 5. Uploaded pictures ids. Rule: optional, exist in pet pictures ids

owner[gender].description: Step 11. Rules: required, min - 1, max - 20, RegExp - ^(male|female|[[:alpha:]]+)$

owner[profile_picture].description: Step 12. base64 string. Rules: required if owner not has profile picture, correct base64 string, types - 'jpg', 'png'

200.description: Success message, pet owner and pet info.

401.description: Unauthenticated error or registration error if user done registration.
